Message.Msg: "the course will go to weeds" - and the Tea party will call it - their "Alamo" - the have not's - the Wanna be's" always scream the loudest - the cure - just like cancer - they haven't found one yet. wanna be presidents always have a cure for what ails this country - a few had the magic wand. these two - forget it !

"robfisk" - all the amenity's to the illegals - is nothing but a drain on the US taxpayer - with no relief in sight. absolutely why this country is looking at financial disaster. the cure ? there is none - it's too late. schools - prisons - welfare all overloaded now - thanks to illegals.
Just a shill for the rich that are sticking it in your culo.

... "Listening to "Ryan" at Randolph Macon College in Ashland,Va. today.. good speech, no nonsense..." Randolph Macon, huh? Gee, being in Virginia, I'd have thought you were more a Liberty U. kinda' guy. You'd fit right in at Jerry Falwell's creation for intellectual & spiritual indoctrination (The Liberty Way). After all, Liberty University's nickname is, very aptly in your case, the "Flames".

Ahem, methinks you may be confusing Ryan with Obama. What private sector experience did he bring to the White House? And now you're seeing the result of voting for an amateur. You're just repeating the left's talking points. Besides that, he does have some real outside the beltway private experience. More than we can say for the nutty professor in the oval office. Quack quack!

what a joke my union is .....1 union 1 fight was larry cohens chant again..all districts had a table of 8 /vice presidents and werent suppose to agree on a contract until all other districts settled welll....once again district 4 midwest agreeed/seth rosen once again....rip....then bell south district 3 judy dennis agreeed on a contract ... shame on her.....so now its just district 9 in california and district 1 in connecticut...whom i belong too.... we only have 3400 union members...we wont get anything more than any other district has gotten...why once again are all these districts agreeing on a contract why not make it harder for att to settle...why not stand your ground until all the districts settle.....we in connecticut will be voting to end our relationship with the cwa and larry " all i care about is increaseing your union dues" cohen..........larry cohen makes millions dont let him fool you...he is the 1 %.......shame on the cwa national union

Message.Title: May I mention AT&T?
Message.Msg: Got an interesting article in my e-mail that sounds ominous. http://www.uncommonwisdomdaily.com/high-growth-wireless-stocks-downshift-14712?FIELD9=2

At this time before the election, Reagan was 9 points behind. Romney is only 4 points behind and two very important factors are in the works. The movie 2016 is introducing the real Obama and depicting what life will be like in 2016 if he wins. It is getting rave reviews and will soon be showing throughout the country. Also, The producer of the excellent CD "Dreams From My REAL Father" has launched a program to send a CD to every household in America. They have already been sent to all homes in Ohio, Florida, and Virginia. That should soon reflect in the polls from those states. Try to place a bet on Obama in Las Vegas; that will give you a better idea than all the polls put together.

I note you live in Virginia which is one of the states that Joel sent his DVD "Dreams From My REAL Father" to every household. Did you get yours? I used the AT&T prepay plan for a couple years and loved it. Never had any trouble with reception. Do you live far out of the main population areas?
I'm confused. How can a drug protect me?
test!!!
Ryan, being an economist, may be able to make the hard decisions. We all know it has to be done. Obama's 2nd term will be more of the same, crony capitalism, this time on steroids.

Total waste of time. The average 10 year old would recognize this as a load of bullcrap. Maybe you should spend a few hours with the video where the nutjob finds drawings within the printed features of a dollar bill and connects them with the ravings of the madman who supposedly wrote Revelations. That one is available on Youtube and is always good for a laugh. Why is your post an appropriate post for a ATT stock message board? Waiting...

Why do you care about your signal? Who in the world would want to talk to you in the first place? Oh, I get it, you cannot get your 976 numbers! Maybe your reception would be better out of the basement.
